task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

plannerResult.raw_task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

subtasks.name: tasks-ui-spec
subtasks.objective: Define the minimal feature set and screen map for the Tasks UI (list, create, edit, complete), plus interaction flows and acceptance criteria for a scaffold.

subtasks.name: tasks-ui-components
subtasks.objective: Create the core UI scaffold with component structure for task list, task item, and task input, plus route/layout shell and local mock data wiring.

subtasks.name: tasks-state-layer
subtasks.objective: Implement lightweight state management for tasks (create/update/complete/delete), seeded mock dataset, and deterministic helpers for future API integration.

subtasks.name: tasks-style-ux
subtasks.objective: Add initial responsive styling, spacing/typography, and accessible interaction polish for empty/loading/error states while keeping the UI intentionally simple.
